scripts.e2e:pr: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=pr pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:nightly: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=nightly pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:release: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=release pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:ui:smoke: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=pr pnpm exec playwright test tests/ui/smoke
scripts.e2e:ui:regression: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=nightly pnpm exec playwright test tests/ui/regression
scripts.e2e:api:smoke: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=pr pnpm exec playwright test tests/api/smoke
scripts.e2e:api:contract: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=pr pnpm exec playwright test tests/api/contract
scripts.e2e:api:integration: cross-env RUN_PROFILE=nightly pnpm exec playwright test tests/api/integration
scripts.e2e:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:debug: cross-env PWDEBUG=1 pnpm exec playwright test
